GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
libbpf: Fix use-after-free in btf_dump_name_dups

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit c61650b869e0b6fb0c0a28ed42d928eea969afc8, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 919d2b1dbb074d438027135ba644411931179a59. For more details please see the references link.
